featured.text: Moreover, because there are fewer humans around, pregnant females often use tea-growing areas as safe shelters to give birth.
they awake, all of the women of child-bearing age have become pregnant.

definition.zh_def: 懷孕的，指女性體內有胎兒發育的狀態。
definition.en_def: Having a developing fetus in the uterus.
definition.example: She is pregnant and expecting her baby in a few months.
